email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We have a shipment of 120,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. We are looking for a vessel with a laycan of 25-30 Oct. Could you provide a freight quote and vessel details?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN MAJESTY (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) for this shipment. The starting freight quote is USD 18.50 per MT on CIF terms. Laycan is 25-30 Oct as requested. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 26-31 Oct?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 26-31 Oct. Please confirm.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - OCEAN MAJESTY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: OCEAN MAJESTY
- Cargo: 120,000MT Iron Ore
- Load Port: Tubarão
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: 26-31 Oct
- Freight: USD 17.75 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
John
